{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16716v1", "title": "Invertible Orbifolds over Finite Fields", "summary": "In the context of Berglund-Huebsch mirror symmetry, we compute the
eigenvalues of the Frobenius endomorphism acting on a p-adic version of
Borisov's complex. As a result, we conjecture an explicit formula for the
number of points of crepant resolutions of invertible Calabi-Yau orbifolds
defined over a finite field.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,hep-th,math.AG", "published": "2025-04-23T13:44:29Z"}
